title: RM2000-RM3000 General : Corporate Sales Executive by Wendy
content:
LOOKING FOR NEW CAREER PATH? 
 
We are HIRING! 
 
If you are someone 
 
-Proactive in learning 
-Good student mentality & great work ethic 
-Demonstrate enthusiasm and passion 
-Work closely with team members to achieve common goals and objective. 
- Demonstrate team spirit and cooperation 
 
WE WANT YOU!! 
 
We are outsource sales & marketing company. We represent MNC client to do corporate presentation, coordinating marketing activities, training and development. 
Income range RM2000-RM3000 depending on experience and capabilities. 
 
Job prospect : 
- Career advancement 
-Travel opportunities 
-Personal development 
-Fun & vibrant environment 
 
Interest applicants, please send in you resume to wendykuah@live.com or whatsapp me at 014-2441184. THANKS!! 
    Mobile  0142441184  Salary  RM2000-RM3000    Location  KL  Working Hours  8am-5pm    Onsite  No  Needed Skills  Sales    Start Date  immediate      Duration  3days
source: Your Trusted Part Time Job Community
